title: THSTI Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 06 Data Coordinator, Project Technical Support and Other Posts
description: The Translation Health Science and Technology Institute (THSTI) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 06 Project Technical Support III, Data Coordinator, and Project Research Scientist  Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.Sc Nursing, M.Sc Nursing, Ph.D., Any Degree, Post-graduation, and Diploma can apply for the THSTI Notification 2025....
